Description: Papyrus. Demotic legal text recto; names of 3 witnesses verso (rest lost). Beginning of 5 lines of text (continued on 10846/2). The two frames join more or less directly.
Curator's comments: Bibliography Martin, C.J. 2016-2017. The Michaelides Demotic Material, Enchoria 35: 1-8.

Demotic Papyrus. Recto: five lines of a demotic document of sale of a cow (beginning lost; continues on 10846/2). Verso: Remains of three witness signatures (at least one other signature lost). See Vleeming, BiblOrient 42 (1985), 511-16 for comments on the incorrect placement of a small fragment.
Bibliographic references: Cruz-Uribe 1985 / Saite and Persian demotic cattle documents; a Study in Legal Forms and Principles in Ancient Egypt (p.31-4)
Kaplony-Heckel 1973 / Ein neuer demotischer Papyrus aus der Zeit des Konigs Hakoris (Sammlung Michaelides) (p.5-20, pl.1-2)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (46073) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/46073)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
